name: Corn and Black Bean Salad
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, lunch, salads and dressings
keywords: appetizer, main course, black beans, corn kernels, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 cup canned black beans, thoroughly rinsed and drained, or 1 cup dried beans cooked
8 to 9 ounces ripe tomato, cored and cut 1/4-inch dice (1 cup)
1 cup lightly packed cilantro leaves, coarsely chopped
1 to 2 jalapeno peppers, fresh or canned, seeded and very finely chopped
1 teaspoon kosher salt, or more if using home-cooked beans

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients. Allow to stand for 1/2 hour. Taste for salt and pepper.
